last_episode_to_air.name: Family
last_episode_to_air.overview: "Modern Family" star Julie Bowen receives expert advice from the adorable peanut gallery on ways to stop embarrassing her sons when she's having fun.

name: A Little Help with Carol Burnett
original_name: A Little Help with Carol Burnett
overview: In this unscripted series starring comedy legend Carol Burnett, kids dish out advice to celebrities and everyday people in front of a live audience.

episodes.name: Friendship
episodes.overview: "Friends" star Lisa Kudrow asks the pint-sized panel for help with clashing commitments. Conflicted Jake can't find the words to tell the truth.

episodes.name: Love
episodes.overview: The kids dish advice on a marriage proposal and mending a broken heart, then help Candace Cameron Bure of "Fuller House" plan a big surprise.

episodes.name: Marriage
episodes.overview: Tony Hale of "Arrested Development" and his wife can't agree when it comes to TV. The kids also help a harried couple find some alone time.

episodes.name: Parenting
episodes.overview: DJ Khaled hates flying -- can the kids help him conquer his fears? Other problems include a messy tween and a kid who won't stay in his own bed.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: David can't deal with his roommate's mother, and Laurie knows no one listens to her. Brittany Snow of "Pitch Perfect" can't stop procrastinating.

episodes.name: #Selfcare
episodes.overview: SOS! Derek Hough of "Dancing With the Stars" isn't getting enough sleep. Other guests struggle with showering -- and smelling a friend's bad breath.

episodes.name: Dating
episodes.overview: Mogul Mark Cuban seeks advice on dealing with his teenage daughter's suitors, and a coif-challenged guy who lives with his parents needs romantic help.

episodes.name: Communication
episodes.overview: Wanda Sykes wants to know how to tell the truth without hurting someone's feelings, while handsome Ben fears people can't understand his French accent.

episodes.name: Tech
episodes.overview: A phone addict solicits ideas for breaking his habit, and "Stranger Things" star Finn Wolfhard gets tips on dealing with a pal's lame text excuses.

episodes.name: Life
episodes.overview: Fed up with the pranks pulled by her "Empire" co-star, Taraji P. Henson asks for suggestions on payback. The kids also offer financial advice.

episodes.name: Big Issues
episodes.overview: After Billy Eichner stops by for pointers on persuading people to call instead of text, the kids weigh in on a hair makeover and wearing a hijab.

episodes.name: Family
episodes.overview: "Modern Family" star Julie Bowen receives expert advice from the adorable peanut gallery on ways to stop embarrassing her sons when she's having fun.
